battlepass_purchase_desc_policy.content:
※ This item will be used immediately upon purchase; refund will be restricted.

※ The Battle Pass is guaranteed to last [at least 90 days from the start of the Season].
The exact end date of the Battle Pass will be notified when the next [Guide for the upcoming Season] is posted.
Please note that your Battle Pass purchase date has no effect on the active duration of the Battle Pass.
